snippet: The company reported “irregularities” with a doctor-training program to the Department of Justice.
abstract: Olympus Corp reports 'irregularities' with a doctor-training program in Brazil to the Department of Justice; says it might have violated the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act.
lead_paragraph: The company reported “irregularities” with a doctor-training program to the Department of Justice.

headline.seo: Olympus Says It Might Have Violated Anti-Bribery Law
headline.main: Olympus Says It Might Have Violated an Anti-Bribery Law
headline.print_headline: Olympus Says It Might Have Violated an Anti-Bribery Law
